action.description: Action type of the policy. (choices: REJECT, REDIRECT_TO_POOL, REDIRECT_TO_URL)

admin_state_down.description: Set admin state up to false.

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

listener.description: ID or name of the listener this policy belongs to.

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

position.description: L7 policy position in ordered policies list. This must be an integer starting from 1. Not specifying the position will place the policy at the tail of existing policies list.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

redirect_pool.description: ID or name of the pool for REDIRECT_TO_POOL action type.

redirect_url.description: URL for REDIRECT_TO_URL action type. This should be a valid URL string.
